channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for HI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for HI

item.title: Report X-2023060322
item.description:
Report X-2023060322

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-14T00:39:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-19
  • City: KAHULUI
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 05/19/2023 at approximately 1845, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 350633 at the station in Kahului, reporting an undeclared dangerous goods shipment. The shipment consisted of several vape pens and vaping liquid. The vaping liquid is within the acceptable limit for transport, however the vape pens contains lithium batteries that were not properly declared. The shipment appeared suspicious to the management team due to the invalid address on the shipping label. The entire shipment is being held, pending an FAA investigation.

item.title: Report X-2023051325
item.description:
Report X-2023051325

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-14T00:39:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-06
  • City: HONOLULU
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On May 6th while offloading a pallet an employee noticed a package that appeared to be leaking. They inspected package inside and outside. Inner package contents were leaking a red liquid. Outside package is a fiberboard box and inner package material is a plastic jerrican. The inner package has a puncture on the top corner unsure of how it got there. DG Admin advised th e employee to place the package into a salvage drum, and to get an amended shippers declaration.

item.title: Report X-2022091378
item.description:
Report X-2022091378

  • Incident Date: 2022-09-20
  • City: HONOLULU
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY 200 UNFORGETTABLE LITES FIREWORKS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.
